name: flood
description: Flood is a modern web UI for managing Transmission or qBittorrent servers. It displays active torrents, stats, and controls downloads from a responsive and themeable interface, ideal for remote managing home torrents.
features: Torrent UI: Modern web interface for torrents, Manage Transmission or qBittorrent, Stats and controls. Beautiful torrent management.
Responsive: Works on all devices. Mobile-friendly.
Remote Access: Manage torrents from anywhere. Convenient control.
Multi-User: Support multiple accounts. Shared server.
RSS Feeds: Auto-download from feeds. Automated workflow.
Speed Graphs: Visualize transfer rates. Performance monitoring.
File Browser: Preview torrent contents. Selective downloads.
Search: Find torrents quickly. Efficient management.
Notifications: Alert on completion. Stay informed.
